sub_title: Teacher and British English Accent Coach
summary:
I am a highly motivated and energetic English teacher with 10+ years experience. I use research-grounded naturalistic methods, especially Comprehensible Input (CI), Teaching Proficiency through Reading and Storytelling (TPRS) and language acquisition through real-life experiences. I have worked in London, Helsinki, Taipei and the Hague, delivering group and one-on-one lessons to adults and teenagers.

Additionally, I am a writer, editor and translator for private clients and companies. I have written original content for various purposes including recipe books and textbooks.

I speak several languages including fluent Mandarin Chinese, which I also teach in private classes.
